name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: God of War Kratos: Strength and Fury in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Channel Kratos' power and relentless spirit with epic visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the raw power of Kratos with stunning visuals from God of War, bringing his fierce battles and godly presence to your screen.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A rugged, battle-ready interface inspired by Kratos' legendary journey, offering a clean and immersive browsing experience.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on track with a clock and date feature designed to complement the theme of the God of War.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites with convenient shortcuts at your fingertips.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into exciting games directly from your browser, unleashing adventure with Kratos by your side.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search with ease using your preferred search engine, integrated directly into the theme.
🚀 More Extension: Customize and enhance your browsing with features inspired by the epic world of God of War.
